game.name: SnowRunner
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 차원이 다른 오프로드를 경험하세요! 강력한 차량으로 진흙, 급류, 눈, 얼어붙은 호수 등 극단적인 환경을 헤쳐 나가며 도전 정신을 자극하는 미션을 혼자 또는 최대 3인의 친구와 함께 완수하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get ready for the next-generation off-road experience! Drive powerful vehicles and overcome extreme open environments to complete dozens of challenging missions solo or with up to 3 friends!

reviewHighlights.text: Bought to play on wheel and it does not support multi usb input for seperate wheel and pedals. Its 2025 this is kinda crazy. Ill be seeking a refund.
While en route to delivery point, you notice a knoll in the patch, you think to yourself, "i can make it".......you can't make it......this is snow ru...
